show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Cradle to Cradle
content: A talk with Michael Braungart, coauthor of Cradle to Cradle: Rethinking the Way We Make Things, about going beyond... <!--more--> merely “doing less damage” to designing and making products and buildings that are “eco-effective” and enhance users and surroundings [braungart.com]; the Cradle to Cradle Certification program; poem by Wislawa Szymborska
